scripts.preinstall: if [ "$SKIP_PREINSTALL" != "true" ]; then node -e "if(process.env.npm_execpath.indexOf('pnpm') === -1) throw new Error('You must use pnpm to install dependencies')"; else echo 'Skipping preinstall script'; fi
scripts.build-common: pnpm rm-static-styles && pnpm generate-styles && pnpm generate-icons-list && pnpm build-sass
scripts.build: pnpm rm-dist && pnpm build-common && cross-env APP_ENV=staging LIB_ENV=staging vite build --mode staging && node build_utils/scripts/updateImportForMixins.js && cross-env APP_ENV=staging LIB_ENV=staging vite build -c vite.config.svgr.js --mode staging
scripts.build:visualizer: pnpm rm-dist && pnpm build-common && cross-env APP_ENV=staging LIB_ENV=staging INCLUDE_VISUALIZER=true vite build --mode staging && node build_utils/scripts/updateImportForMixins.js && cross-env APP_ENV=staging LIB_ENV=staging vite build -c vite.config.svgr.js --mode staging
scripts.build:buildStats: pnpm rm-dist && pnpm build-common && cross-env APP_ENV=staging LIB_ENV=staging INCLUDE_BUILD_STATS=true vite build --mode staging && node build_utils/scripts/updateImportForMixins.js && cross-env APP_ENV=staging LIB_ENV=staging vite build -c vite.config.svgr.js --mode staging
scripts.build:visualizer:buildStats: pnpm rm-dist && pnpm build-common && cross-env APP_ENV=staging LIB_ENV=staging INCLUDE_VISUALIZER=true INCLUDE_BUILD_STATS=true vite build --mode staging && node build_utils/scripts/updateImportForMixins.js && cross-env APP_ENV=staging LIB_ENV=staging vite build -c vite.config.svgr.js --mode staging

scripts.build:prod: pnpm rm-dist && pnpm build-common && cross-env APP_ENV=staging LIB_ENV=production vite build --mode prod && node build_utils/scripts/updateImportForMixins.js && cross-env APP_ENV=staging LIB_ENV=staging vite build -c vite.config.svgr.js --mode staging

scripts.lint: pnpm lint-js "**/*.{mts,cts,ts,tsx,mjs,cjs,js,jsx,mdx}" && pnpm lint-css "**/*.{css,scss}" && pnpm prettier .
scripts.lint:fix: pnpm lint-js:fix "**/*.{mts,cts,ts,tsx,mjs,cjs,js,jsx,mdx}" && pnpm lint-css:fix "**/*.{css,scss}" && pnpm prettier:fix .
scripts.storybook: pnpm build-common && cross-env APP_ENV=staging IS_STORYBOOK=true LIB_ENV=development BE_ENV=development storybook dev -p 6006
scripts.storybook:visualizer: pnpm build-common && cross-env APP_ENV=staging IS_STORYBOOK=true LIB_ENV=development BE_ENV=development INCLUDE_VISUALIZER=true storybook dev -p 6006
